statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ 6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ -2 \\ -14 \\ 16 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 2 \\ 8 \\ -10 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
